summary.span: Encapsulates a collection of controls for use by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是以零為起始的索引的集合所使用類別以包裝所有指派給工具列控制項。The is a zero-based indexed collection used by the class to hold all the controls assigned to the toolbar. 使用方法，將個別的按鈕和方法，以刪除它們。Use the method to add individual buttons and the method to delete them. 呼叫方法從集合移除所有的按鈕。Call the method to remove all the buttons from the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立並初始化和三個控制項。The following code example creates and initializes a and three controls. 工具列按鈕會指派給工具列和工具列加入至表單。The toolbar buttons are assigned to the toolbar and the toolbar is added to the form. 此程式碼需要已經建立。This code requires that a has already been created. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會保留的實際數目指派至集合的控制項。The property holds the actual number of controls assigned to the collection. 它會使用上限迴圈來逐一查看集合的屬性值。It is common to use the property value as the upper bounds of a loop to iterate through a collection. 集合的索引值是以零為起始的索引，因此您必須從迴圈變數減去否則您將會超出上限的集合並擲回例外狀況。The index value of a collection is a zero-based index, so you must subtract one from the looping variable otherwise you will exceed the upper bounds of the collection and throw an exception. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例顯示的之前和之後方法呼叫。The following code example displays the of the before and after the method is called. 此程式碼需要與至少一個已建立。This code requires that a with at least one has been created.
